name: STARSHIP AGENT
description:
This is First Person Shooter for you guys to relax after a hard day. It has only one level, but four difficulty setting that will increase power and number of enemies.

 There are four enemies on this level: two ranged ones, one melee and a turret.

Also, you will have a chance to find 5 ranged weapons (pistol, rifle, shotgun, sniper and bazooka), while you start with an axe, a melee weapon that has some AOE potential :)

This is my first game, there's going to be a lot of bugs so please forgive me.  I'll fix them and upload as soon as I can.

Have fun!
